member.name: T:GoodAI.Modules.TestingNodes.DynamicBlocks.DynamicOutputNode
member.summary: A node that reallocates the output block in each step to a random size and fills it with random data.

member.name: T:GoodAI.Modules.TestingNodes.DynamicBlocks.DynamicInputNode
member.summary: A node that takes dynamic input, reallocates the output to match the input, copies the data using the GPU and prints out control sums.
